mapper.insert: INSERT INTO curriculum (curriculum_id, curriculum_name, teacher_id, teacher_name, price, stock, stock_used, begin_time, end_time, info) VALUES (#{curriculumId}, #{curriculumName}, #{teacherId}, #{teacherName}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{stockUsed}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{info})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM curriculum WHERE now() - end_time > 0
